channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 2nd June

item.title: Street light in Pitt Mill Grds not functional, 1st June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pitt Mill Gardens, Hucclecote, Gloucester

item.title: Potholes getting bigger, 1st June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Runnings Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: The bridleway has become dangerous for walkers, cyclists and horses / horse riders. The surface of the bridleway has broken up leaving deep and wide holes and and unfirm surface. Someone or a horse could easily be injured if not taking great care., 1st June
item.description:
The photos are just a sample of the state of the bridleway, it is particularly bad between RedHouse Farm and The Folly. The route is part of a circular route to Deerhurst and is used by many people, especially during the summer months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hoo Lane, Deerhurst, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Where the resurfaced part of the road ends, the resurfacing wasn't graded down to the remaining road, causing cars to bump down onto the old road, creating deep pot holes either side of the road., 1st June
item.description:
This is just past Orchard Farm House at the end of the recently resurfaced part of the road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hoo Lane, Deerhurst, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
